title: FS: deadball era amateur baseball RPPCs
author: darwinbulldog

posts.post_title: FS: deadball era amateur baseball RPPCs
posts.post_content:
Semipro teams and high school teams mainly. No major league teams. Mostly RPPCs. Mostly deadball era. Mostly lower condition. Some (but not most) were postally used.

$25 apiece or 5 for $100.
Chester Base Ball Team, Hershey PA, Bloomer Girls, and hillside game PCs have been claimed.

Almost all gone now. I still have the one with the torn corners, the one in front of the grandstand, the Columbus vs. Toledo one with the small picture, and the Baseball Lovers "Balk" postcard.

I can give someone a deal on those four if anyone's interested. Otherwise I expect I'll have another group of postcards to list here later in the month.
